verbs.description: Former First Lady Laura Bush [V: has] weighed in on the Trump administration policy of separating immigrant children from their parents , calling the practice " immoral . "

[ARG0: Former First Lady Laura Bush] has [V: weighed] in [ARG1: on the Trump administration policy of separating immigrant children from their parents] , [ARGM-ADV: calling the practice " immoral] . "
Former First Lady Laura Bush has weighed in on the Trump administration policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] , calling the practice " immoral . "
[ARG0: Former First Lady Laura Bush] has weighed in on the Trump administration policy of separating immigrant children from their parents , [V: calling] [ARG1: the practice] [ARG2: " immoral] . "
